actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing Representative Goodling of Pennsylvania to the Committee on Foreign Affairs and Representative Ireland of Florida to the Committee on Small Business.

summary.text: Elects Representative William F. Goodling of Pennsylvania to the Committee on Foreign Affairs and Representative Andy Ireland of Florida to the Committee on Small Business.

titles.title: A resolution electing Representative Goodling of Pennsylvania to the Committee on Foreign Affairs and Representative Ireland of Florida to the Committee on Small Business.
